com.wikitude.tracker

Interface TrackerEventListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClientTrackerEventListener, CloudTrackerEventListener

    public interface TrackerEventListener
    Generic base type for ClientTrackerEventListener and CloudTrackerEventListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onExtendedTrackingQualityUpdate(Tracker tracker_, java.lang.String targetName_, int oldTrackingQuality_, int newTrackingQuality_)
      Will be called regularly to indicate current extended tracking quality.
      void onTargetLost(Tracker tracker_, java.lang.String targetName_)
      Will be called on the first frame the tracker can't recognize a tracked target anymore
      void onTargetRecognized(Tracker tracker_, java.lang.String targetName_)
      Will be called once when the tracker recognizes a new target
      void onTracking(Tracker tracker_, RecognizedTarget recognizedTarget_)
      Will be called for every frame in which the tracker can recognize the target

    • Method Detail

      • onTargetRecognized

        void onTargetRecognized(Tracker tracker_,
                      java.lang.String targetName_)
        Will be called once when the tracker recognizes a new target
        Parameters:
        tracker_ - The tracker instance which recognized the target
        targetName_ - The name of the target which was recognized

      • onTracking

        void onTracking(Tracker tracker_,
              RecognizedTarget recognizedTarget_)
        Will be called for every frame in which the tracker can recognize the target
        Parameters:
        tracker_ - The tracker instance which recognized the target and is now tracking it
        recognizedTarget_ - Information concerning the currently tracked target

      • onTargetLost

        void onTargetLost(Tracker tracker_,
                java.lang.String targetName_)
        Will be called on the first frame the tracker can't recognize a tracked target anymore
        Parameters:
        tracker_ - The tracker instance which tracked a target and now lost it
        targetName_ - The name of the target which was lost

      • onExtendedTrackingQualityUpdate

        void onExtendedTrackingQualityUpdate(Tracker tracker_,
                                   java.lang.String targetName_,
                                   int oldTrackingQuality_,
                                   int newTrackingQuality_)
        Will be called regularly to indicate current extended tracking quality.
        Parameters:
        tracker_ - The tracker instance which is in extended tracking mode
        targetName_ - The name of the target which is tracked extended
        oldTrackingQuality_ - Tracking quality from the last update
        newTrackingQuality_ - Current tracking quality
